comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Mother Jones was in the audience during the New York hearings of the Walsh Commission in January, 1915. This is probably taken in front of City Hall. historymatters.gmu.edu/d/5735/

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Indeed she was, artolog. Thanks for pointing this out. We will add the date and location the next time we update the record.
